ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.CUSTOMER This is a concat file used to store AZ account keys which are belong to a customer.
This field holds the AZ accounts belong to the customer given in the CUSTOMER.NO.
This is the key field to this file which holds the customer id of the AZ account.

desc.p: This field holds the AZ accounts belong to the customer given in the CUSTOMER.NO.
This is the key field to this file which holds the customer id of the AZ account.
